name: Sonic Run VR
description:
Sonic Run VR is a Sonic The Hedgehog fangame that I made as my own challenge to make a sonic game in just 72h!

In-game you will run through many obstacles, collect different rewards, and try to have the highest score on the World Global Table! 

Or if you are a more casual player u could focus on collecting rings and unlock new biomes, gloves, and even your favorite soundtracks from the Sonic series!
